Игра развивает идеи первой части, параллельно добавляя несколько новых. Я не буду расписывать все достоинства этой игры, т.к. до меня это уже сделали все кому не лень. Для меня это одна из самых любимых игр
花得最值的6块钱

where the first game was a fairly chill coaster, this one is like 40 wild rides in one in just about the best way i could imagine. the ending is one of those where you'd never really be able to predict, but feels in-character and is so satisfying. only complaint is that, compared to portal 1, it's pretty long - the only reason i finished the game in like 40 hours on here compared to like 13ish on 1 is that i understood the mechanics pretty much from the get-go.

well, okay, bit of a lie there: mostly, it's that there's nothing like chamber 18 of 1. i had to cheat that one

also. the whole storyline and backstory is interesting beyond all hell. [b]b u t[/b]. i feel bad for chell. i kinda don't think she's gonna be able to live much of a normal life after this

It's Portal 2. Good game. We had it on a console and rebought for PC. Nice to be able to play two player without being split screen, but it is a little more difficult to know what your partner is doing when you can't see both on the same screen easily. There is a button you can hold to see the other player's point of view, but it isn't quite the same. Recommend using a controller rather than keyboard/mouse for easiest playthrough.
